<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.76

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Program Flow

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if the script originated from some UI control event, for example from "onButtonDown" EH. Exists within parent scope and immediate child scopes.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>  '''isUIContext'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[isUIContext]]) [[then]] {[[hint]] "UI control event"};</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_button [[ctrlSetEventHandler]] ['ButtonDown',"[[call]] {[[diag_log]] [[isUIContext]]}"]; // Outputs true</code>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_button [[ctrlSetEventHandler]] ['ButtonDown',"[] [[spawn]] {[[diag_log]] [[isUIContext]]}"]; // Outputs false</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[canSuspend]], [[isRemoteExecuted]], [[isRemoteExecutedJIP]], [[isGamePaused]], [[isGameFocused]], [[serverCommand]]
</value></part></template></root>
